creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pullover; front and back not determined; black; one side has large teal slik appliqued square frame with cross stitch in red, green and white and appliqued scrolled triangles in teal; tail has appliqued teal rectangle filled with geometric patterns in orange, green and purple; sleeve repeats applique motif; wide stand-up collar with ties and border on sleeves are purple; shorter side is plain black
title: Jacket
